testcase.name: user add item to wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given Initiate wishlist.....................................................passed When user scrolls to Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch and clicks Add to wishlist Button.passed And user click on add to wishlist...........................................passed Then item is added to wishlist..............................................passed

testcase.name: User enter valid email and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed When enter email "moRajab@gmail.com"........................................passed And enter password as "Asdfgh"..............................................passed And click on Login Button...................................................passed Then user is navigated to the home page.....................................passed

testcase.name: User enters invalid non existing email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed When enter email "moRajgcgcab@gmail.com"....................................passed And enter password as "Asdfgh"..............................................passed And click on Login Button...................................................passed Then invalid login error message appears....................................passed

testcase.name: user enters email with invalid format
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed When enter email "moRajabgcom"..............................................passed And enter password as "Asdfgh"..............................................passed And click on Login Button...................................................passed Then wrong email error message appears......................................passed

testcase.name: user want to recover a forgotten password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed Given user clicks on forget password button.................................passed When enter email as "moRajab@gmail.com".....................................passed And click on Recover Button.................................................passed Then Email with instructions has been sent to user..........................passed

testcase.classname: user can filter products by color
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to shoes category page..................................passed When user select red color..................................................passed Then the red shoes are displayed............................................passed

testcase.name: user add two items to compare list
testcase.system-out: Given user initiate comparelist.............................................passed When user open home page and navigates to Cell phones category..............passed And click on add to compare list button for HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop and HTC One Mini Blue.passed And click on open compare list notification.................................passed Then the "HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop" and "HTC One Mini Blue" are in the compare list.passed

testcase.classname: user can manage his cart by adding, updating or deleting items
testcase.name: user add product to his/her cart
testcase.system-out: Given Initiate manage cart..................................................passed When user scrolls to Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch and clicks Add to cart Button.passed And enter quantity of "2" and click on ADD TO CART Button and open cart.....passed Then the product "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" is added successfully to the cart.passed

testcase.classname: user can manage his cart by adding, updating or deleting items
testcase.name: user updates the quantity of added item
testcase.system-out: Given Initiate manage cart..................................................passed When user opens the cart....................................................passed And type the updated quantity "4" and click on update cart..................passed Then the product quantity is updated to "4".................................passed

testcase.classname: user can manage his cart by adding, updating or deleting items
testcase.name: user deletes a product from cart

testcase.classname: user can manage his cart by adding, updating or deleting items
testcase.name: user add existing product to his/her cart
testcase.system-out: Given Initiate manage cart..................................................passed When user scrolls to Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch and clicks Add to cart Button.passed And enter quantity of "10" and click on ADD TO CART Button and open cart....passed Then the product "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" is added successfully to the cart.passed
